Q_NAME: Calculate Grading for a Student based on Student Marks
Q_DESC:
Write a program to find the grade of the student based on the student mark.
If marks between >=28 to <=35 print Grade C
If marks between >=36 to <=60 print Grade B
If marks between >=61 to <=100 print Grade A
Otherwise print Fail.

Mandatory

1.Create a new class named "Grade" apart from the main class (TestClass).
2.Create a method named grade() with no arguments to get the single student mark and to calculate the grade of the student based on it.
3.Create an object "g" for the class Grade in the main class and access the method Grade() using that object.
